mapper.insert: insert into opt_proposal_approve (PROPOSAL_APPROVE_ID, SALES_PROPOSAL_INSTANCE_ID, APPROVE_NODE_ID, APPROVE_NODE_NAME, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON_ID, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON_NAME, IS_CURRENT_APPROVE, APPROVAL_RESULT, APPROVAL_STATUS, APPROVAL_OPINION, APPROVAL_DATE, ORG_ID, OP_ID, DONE_DATE, DONE_CODE, STATE ) values (#{proposalApproveId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{salesProposalInstanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{approveNodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveNodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsiblePersonId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{responsiblePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCurrentApprove,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{approvalResult,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{approvalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{doneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

mapper.update:
update opt_proposal_approve
PROPOSAL_APPROVE_ID = #{record.proposalApproveId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SALES_PROPOSAL_INSTANCE_ID = #{record.salesProposalInstanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APPROVE_NODE_ID = #{record.approveNodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVE_NODE_NAME = #{record.approveNodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESPONSIBLE_PERSON_ID = #{record.responsiblePersonId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RESPONSIBLE_PERSON_NAME = #{record.responsiblePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CURRENT_APPROVE = #{record.isCurrentApprove,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APPROVAL_RESULT = #{record.approvalResult,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APPROVAL_STATUS = #{record.approvalStatus,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APPROVAL_OPINION = #{record.approvalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVAL_DATE = #{record.approvalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OP_ID = #{record.opId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DONE_DATE = #{record.doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DONE_CODE = #{record.doneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update opt_proposal_approve set PROPOSAL_APPROVE_ID = #{record.proposalApproveId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SALES_PROPOSAL_INSTANCE_ID = #{record.salesProposalInstanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPROVE_NODE_ID = #{record.approveNodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_NODE_NAME = #{record.approveNodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON_ID = #{record.responsiblePersonId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON_NAME = #{record.responsiblePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CURRENT_APPROVE = #{record.isCurrentApprove,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPROVAL_RESULT = #{record.approvalResult,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPROVAL_STATUS = #{record.approvalStatus,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPROVAL_OPINION = #{record.approvalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVAL_DATE = #{record.approvalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OP_ID = #{record.opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DONE_DATE = #{record.doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DONE_CODE = #{record.doneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update opt_proposal_approve
SALES_PROPOSAL_INSTANCE_ID = #{salesProposalInstanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APPROVE_NODE_ID = #{approveNodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVE_NODE_NAME = #{approveNodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESPONSIBLE_PERSON_ID = #{responsiblePersonId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RESPONSIBLE_PERSON_NAME = #{responsiblePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CURRENT_APPROVE = #{isCurrentApprove,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APPROVAL_RESULT = #{approvalResult,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APPROVAL_STATUS = #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APPROVAL_OPINION = #{approvalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVAL_DATE = #{approvalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DONE_DATE = #{doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DONE_CODE = #{doneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where PROPOSAL_APPROVE_ID = #{proposalApproveId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update opt_proposal_approve set SALES_PROPOSAL_INSTANCE_ID = #{salesProposalInstanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPROVE_NODE_ID = #{approveNodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_NODE_NAME = #{approveNodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON_ID = #{responsiblePersonId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON_NAME = #{responsiblePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CURRENT_APPROVE = #{isCurrentApprove,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPROVAL_RESULT = #{approvalResult,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPROVAL_STATUS = #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPROVAL_OPINION = #{approvalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVAL_DATE = #{approvalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DONE_DATE = #{doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DONE_CODE = #{doneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=BIGINT} where PROPOSAL_APPROVE_ID = #{proposalApproveId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
